titleStmt.title: Articles collected out of the rubrick of the Book of common-prayer, and other ecclesiastical laws now in force. For the help and assistance of the church-wardens and side-men (with the assistance of their ministers) of every parish within the Arch-Deaconry of Norfolk. In the visitation of the Reverend Edward Reynolds M.A. Arch-Deacon of the Arch-Deaconry of Norfolk. In the year of our Lord God 1671. Sir Justinian Lewyn knight, and Dr. of Laws, official.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Norfolk. Archdeacon (1661-1698 : Reynolds)

titleStmt.title: Articles collected out of the rubrick of the Book of common-prayer, and other ecclesiastical laws now in force. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Crook at the Green-Dragon without Temple-Barr,
